components/products/products-featured:
• Featured Products
  • Best Sellers
    {{#each this}}
  • {{> components/products/product-grid-item this default_image=../theme_settings.default-product-image quick_shop=../theme_settings.quick-shop as_low_as=../theme_settings.price_as_low_as }}
    • {{/each}}
stuff
components/products/product-grid-item:
{{#if brand.name}}
{{brand.name}}
{{/if}}
{{name}}
{{> components/products/price price=price as_low_as=as_low_as }}
components/common/compare-checkbox:
<input
  type="checkbox"
  class="input-checkbox sr-only"
  id="compare-{{id}}"
  data-compare-checkbox
  data-compare-id="{{id}}"
  data-compare-title="{{name}}"
  data-compare-url="{{url}}"
  data-compare-price="{{price.without_tax.formatted}}"
  data-compare-thumbnail="{{getImage image 'thumb' (cdn default_image)}}">
